citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:55 am on 25
January 2022.
The inspector called both contact numbers on file. The inspector spoke to an employee outside of the building who is not
authorized to conduct the inspection. This employee contacted the facility representative and confirmed that he was not
available for an inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.38(b)  Repeat

The inspector called both contact numbers on file. The inspector spoke to an employee outside of the building who is not 
authorized to conduct the inspection. This employee contacted the facility representative and confirmed that he was not
